Precaution: Keep the affected area clean and dry
Avoid sharing personal items like towels and clothing
Use antifungal creams or ointments as directed by a doctor
Avoid the allergen that causes the reaction
Keep antihistamines handy during allergy season
Wear protective gear if exposed to dust or pollen
Avoid lying down immediately after eating
Reduce intake of spicy and acidic foods
Elevate the head of the bed while sleeping
Take thyroid hormone replacement as prescribed
Avoid foods rich in iodine blockers
Regular monitoring of thyroid levels is essential
